title: Shakti
summary: In Hinduism, especially Shaktism (a theological tradition of Hinduism), Shakti (Devanagari: शक्ति, IAST: Śakti; lit. "Energy, ability, strength, effort, power, capability"[1]) is the primordial cosmic energy, and represents the dynamic forces that are thought to move through the universe.[2] This energy is thought of as creative, sustaining, as well as destructive, and is sometimes referred to as auspicious source energy.
